title: UK source: Unless EU compromises, then there will be a no-deal Brexit
text:
British Union Jack and EU flags are pictured before the meeting with Britain's Brexit Secretary Stephen Barclay and European Union's chief Brexit negotiator Michel Barnier at the EU Commission headquarters in Brussels, Belgium, September 20, 2019. Kenzo Tribouillard/Pool via REUTERS/Files

LONDON (Reuters) - Unless the European Union compromises and does a Brexit deal shortly, then the United Kingdom will leave without a deal, a senior Downing Street source said on Tuesday.

“If the EU doesn’t do a deal shortly, then we leave without a deal,” the source told Reuters. “We are leaving the European Union.”
